parameter.label: Username
parameter.tooltip: The User's username

result.name: Attributes Map JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON representation of the users attributes

result.name: Created By
result.tooltip: The username of the user who created the user

result.name: Display Name
result.tooltip: The Display Name of the user that was retreived

result.name: Email
result.tooltip: The Email of the user that was retreived

result.name: Enabled
result.tooltip: If the user that was retreived is enabled

result.name: Exists
result.tooltip: If the user exists in the system

result.name: Memberships JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON representation of the users team memberships

result.name: Preferred Locale
result.tooltip: The Preferred Locale of the user that was retreived

result.name: Profile Attributes Map JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON representation of the users profile attributes

result.name: Space Admin
result.tooltip: If the user that was retreived is a Space Admin

result.name: Timezone
result.tooltip: The Timezone of the user that was retreived

result.name: Updated By
result.tooltip: The username of the user who last updated the retrieved user

result.tooltip: The Username of the user that was retreived

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Method
parameter.tooltip: GET,POST,PUT,PATCH,DELETE (Defaults to GET)

parameter.label: Path
parameter.tooltip: Example: /kapps/:kappSlug/forms/:formSlug

parameter.label: Body
parameter.tooltip: JSON body if applicable (POST,PUT,PATCH)
